name: Reveal (itch) (Fabio Marocchi)
description:
What you see at the beginning is not the true form of the world you live in.
Reveal the true nature of your world through defeat.
Die and die again until you see it for what it really is. Then die some more.

Controls:
WASD or directional arrows for movement (up is jump, also available with spacebar)

Made in a week for Community Game Jam 2019 by Fabio Marocchi

Feel free to comment with your score if you reach the end :)
